text: Airmail (or air mail) is a mail transport service. Airmail may also refer to: *Airmail (album), a 2000 album by Epicure *Air Mail (album), a 1981 album by Air *Air Mail (film), a 1932 American film by John Ford *Airmail (fresco), a 1937 American fresco painting by Edwin Boyd Johnson *The Air Mail, a 1925 silent film directed by Irvin Willat *Air Mail (video game), a 2012 iOS game *Airmail (email client), an email client for iPhone and Mac OS X
title: Airmail (disambiguation)
